n = int(input())
c = list(map(int, input().split()))
w = list(map(int, input().split()))
one = 100000
two = 100000
three = 100000
for i in range(n):
    if w[i] == 1:
        one = min(one, c[i])
    elif w[i] == 2:
        two = min(two, c[i])
    else:
        three = min(three, c[i])
print(three if one + two > three else one + two)

n = int(input())
ct = list(zip(map(int, input().split()), map(int, input().split())))
t = min([c for (c, t) in ct if t == 1], default=100000)
a = min([c for (c, a) in ct if a == 2], default=100000)
at = min([c for (c, at) in ct if at == 3], default=100000)
print(min(t + a, at))

n = int(input())
li = list(map(int, input().split()))
li2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
mo = max(li)
mt = max(li)
mth = max(li)
for i in range(n):
    if li2[i] == 1:
        mo = min(mo, li[i])
    elif li2[i] == 2:
        mt = min(mt, li[i])
    else:
        mth = min(mth, li[i])
print(min(mo + mt, mth))

n = int(input())
l1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
l2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
p1 = max(l1)
p2 = max(l1)
p3 = max(l1)
for i in range(n):
    if l2[i] == 1:
        p1 = min(p1, l1[i])
    elif l2[i] == 2:
        p2 = min(p2, l1[i])
    else:
        p3 = min(p3, l1[i])
print(min(p1 + p2, p3))

n = int(input())
money = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]
ty = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]
cost1 = 100000
cost2 = 100000
cost3 = 100000
for i in range(n):
    if ty[i] == 1:
        cost1 = min(cost1, money[i])
    elif ty[i] == 2:
        cost2 = min(cost2, money[i])
    else:
        cost3 = min(cost3, money[i])
cost = cost1 + cost2
print(cost if cost <= cost3 else cost3)

ty = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]
cost1 = 100000
cost2 = 100000
cost3 = 100000
for i in range(n):
    if ty[i] == 1:
        cost1 = min(cost1, money[i])

n = int(input())
coins = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
types = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
translators = []
authors = []
author_translators = []
for i in range(n):
    if types[i] == 1:
        translators.append(coins[i])
    elif types[i] == 2:
        authors.append(coins[i])
    else:
        author_translators.append(coins[i])
min_translator = min(translators) if len(translators) > 0 else float('inf')
min_author = min(authors) if len(authors) > 0 else float('inf')
min_author_translator = min(author_translators) if len(author_translators) > 0 else float('inf')
min_total = float('inf')
if min_translator != float('inf') and min_author != float('inf'):
    min_total = min_translator + min_author
min_total = min(min_total, min_author_translator)
print(min_total)
